SourceString: Ichthian spike-sticks are brutal but effective weapons.
The gas in this scepter seems to make it lighter.
Ichthian spike-sticks are brutal but effective weapons.
The limbs of this bow seem to be the ribs of a great fish.
The limbs of this bow seem to be the ribs of a great fish.
Smelly rags adorned with charms crafted out of various gems and sea creatures.
Bone armor blessed by ichthian witches to offer protection against strikes and curses alike.
Crude armor of rope, bones and shells. Provides a mix of protection and freedom of movement.
The perfect weapon for underwater hunting.
Used by ichthians to hunt whales in deep, cold waters.
The ichthians craft their weapons from the jawbones of sea beasts.
A rotting but unexpectetly sharp slab of bone
Ichthian alchemists experiment on all sorts of creatures to tailor to their purposes.
Only the gods know which dark powers gave the ichthians their magic.
Ichthian alchemists have a fascination with poisonous fish, urchins, and arachnids.
Crafted from a shell of enormous size.
